Title: Big Bad Wolf
Writer: Joe Gayton (creator), Tony Gayton (creator), Mark Richard, Bruce Marshall Romans (executive story editor), Lolis Eric Elie (executive story editor), Tom Brady (staff writer)
Actors: Anson Mount, Colm Meaney, Common, Jennifer Ferrin
Plot: After a hard winter, Cullen and Elam travel to New York to secure their positions on the railroad as Durant fights for his legacy from prison.
